    • Method Detail

      • getBaseLanguage

        public abstract Language getBaseLanguage()
        Returns:
        the language of the main PSI tree (or the only one in a single-tree view providers). Used when returning a PsiFile from PsiManager.findFile(VirtualFile), PsiDocumentManager.getPsiFile(Document) etc.

      • getAllFiles

        public java.util.List<PsiFile> getAllFiles()
        Returns:
        all PSI files for this view provider. In most cases, just one main file. For multi-root languages, several files. The files' languages should be the same as FileViewProvider.getLanguages(). The main file which corresponds to FileViewProvider.getBaseLanguage(), should be the first one. Otherwise the order is non-deterministic and should not be relied upon.

      • removeFile

      • checkAllTreesEqual

        public void checkAllTreesEqual()

      • createCopy

        public final MultiplePsiFilesPerDocumentFileViewProvider createCopy(VirtualFile fileCopy)
        Description copied from interface: FileViewProvider
        Creates a copy of this view provider linked with the given (typically light) file. The result provider is required to be NOT event-system-enabled.
        See Also:
        LightVirtualFile, FileViewProvider.isEventSystemEnabled()

      • cloneInner

        protected abstract MultiplePsiFilesPerDocumentFileViewProvider cloneInner(VirtualFile fileCopy)

      • findElementAt

        public PsiElement findElementAt(int offset,
                                java.lang.Class<? extends Language> lang)
        Returns:
        the deepest (leaf) PSI element in the PSI tree with the specified root language class at the specified offset.
        See Also:
        FileViewProvider.getBaseLanguage(), FileViewProvider.findElementAt(int)

      • findElementAt

        public PsiElement findElementAt(int offset)
        Returns:
        the deepest (leaf) PSI element in the main PSI tree at the specified offset.
        See Also:
        FileViewProvider.getBaseLanguage(), FileViewProvider.findElementAt(int, Class), FileViewProvider.findElementAt(int, Language), PsiElement.findElementAt(int)

      • findReferenceAt

        public PsiReference findReferenceAt(int offset)
        Returns:
        a reference in the main PSI tree at the specified offset.
        See Also:
        FileViewProvider.getBaseLanguage(), PsiElement.findReferenceAt(int), FileViewProvider.findReferenceAt(int, Language)

      • contentsSynchronized

        public void contentsSynchronized()
        Description copied from interface: FileViewProvider
        Invoked after PSI in the corresponding file is synchronized with the corresponding document, which can happen after VFS, document or PSI changes.

        Multi-language file view providers may override this method to recalculate template data languages.

        Specified by:
        contentsSynchronized in interface FileViewProvider
        Overrides:
        contentsSynchronized in class AbstractFileViewProvider
        See Also:
        FileViewProvider.getLanguages()
